participant_1.background:
I'm planning to take my dog to the park this weekend.
I don't have a lot of time to exercise because I work long hours at the museum, but I try to get out for a walk every day.
i play dungeons and dragons.
After a long day of designing and testing new environmental technologies, I relax by going for a run in my blue shoes.
my father use to drive a taxi cab in the 1970 s.

participant_2.background:
My family is so supportive, even though my hobby is a bit unusual.
chocolate is my favorite food.
i like going to rock concerts.
I do not really care about my appearance.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good, I am about to go out to a rock concert.
Sounds fun! I am going to relax at home and play some dungeons and dragons.
I have never heard of that. What is it?
It is a role playing game where you create a character and go on adventures with your friends.
That sounds really fun! I wish I had time to learn how to play.
It is really easy to pick up. I think I would be more worried about the time commitment.
I have a lot of free time. I do not work and I live with my parents.
I am jealous! I work long hours at the museum and have to come home and design and test new environmental technologies.
That sounds like a really hard job.
It can be, but it is also really rewarding. I am really passionate about environmental protection.
I can see that. You seem like a really caring person.
Thank you! I try to be. I am glad you are having a good day.
I am, and I hope you have a great evening playing dungeons and dragons.
Thank you! I am sure I will.
